doc.title: Hiang Soon Otar: AKA Jalan Kayu Otar
doc.text: I/PRP asked/VBD our/PRP$ facebook/JJ fans/NNS where/WRB I/PRP can/MD get/VB the/DT best/JJ Otar/NN in/IN Singapore/NNP and/CC this/DT particular/JJ shop/NN at/IN Jalan/NN Kayu/NN turned/VBD up/IN the/DT most/NN times/NNS !/. I/PRP have/VB been/VBN to/TO Jalan/VB Kayu/NN on/IN many/JJ occasions/NNS but/CC I/PRP do/VBP n't/RB ever/RB remember/VB seeing/VBG an/DT Otar/NN stall/NN there/RB !/. The/DT funny/NN thing/NN is/VBZ that/RB most/JJ people/NNS do/VBP n't/RB even/RB know/VB that/IN the/DT name/NN of/IN the/DT stall/NN is/VBZ actually/RB Hiang/NN Soon/NN Otar/NN ,/, they/PRP simply/RB called/VBD it/PRP Jalan/IN Kayu/NN Otar/NN ./. I/PRP think/VB the/DT owners/NNS might/VBD need/NN to/TO do/VB some/DT rebranding/JJ soon/NN !/. Talking/JJ about/IN Otah/NN ,/, I/PRP was/VBD reprimanded/VBN by/IN one/CD of/IN our/PRP$ readers/NNS that/IN this/DT particular/JJ snack/NN is/VBZ supposed/JJ to/TO be/VB called/VBD Otak-Otak/NN in/IN Malay/NN and/CC not/RB Otah/JJ or/CC Otar/JJ ./. Incidentally/JJ ,/, in/IN case/NN you/PRP do/VBP n't/RB know/VB ,/, Otak/JJ Otak/NN in/IN Malay/NN means/NN ``/NN brains/NNS ''/VBG and/CC they/PRP called/VBD it/PRP Otak/RB Otak/VBD because/IN the/DT texture/NN resembles/IN the/DT mushy/NN brains/NNS of/IN some/JJ unfortunate/NN animal/NN ./. But/CC you/PRP know/VBP ,/, I/PRP feel/VB Otah/NN or/CC Otar/NN is/VBZ very/RB much/JJ now/RB a/DT part/NN of/IN our/PRP$ Singlish/JJ vocabulary/NN ./. The/DT Chinese/NNP community/NN has/VBZ adopted/JJ and/CC transliterated/JJ many/JJ other/JJ Malay/NN words/NN such/NN as/IN Pasak/NNP -LRB-/NNP Market/NNP -RRB-/NNP ,/, Nasi/NNP Lormah/NNP -LRB-/NNP Nasi/NNP Lemak/NNP -RRB-/NN ,/, and/CC Loti/JJ Planta/NN -LRB-/NN Roti/NN Prata/NN -RRB-/NN so/RB I/PRP think/VB it/PRP is/VBZ quite/RB acceptable/JJ to/TO call/VBP Otak-Otak/JJ ,/, Otah/NN ./. You/PRP know/VB what/WP it/PRP is/VBZ ,/, I/PRP know/VBP what/WP it/PRP is/VBZ ,/, so/RB relac/JJ ah/NN !/. -LRB-/JJ relax/NN ,/, take/VB it/PRP easy/RB -RRB-/VBD ./. Anyway/RB ,/, in/IN general/NN ,/, there/RB are/VBP two/CD different/JJ types/NN of/IN Otah/NN popularly/NN sold/VBD in/IN Singapore/NNP ./. Those/NNS that/WDT are/VBP wrapped/VBN in/IN coconut/NN leaves/VBZ and/CC those/RB that/WDT are/VBP wrapped/VBN in/IN banana/NN leaves/VBZ ./. There/EX are/VBP of/IN course/NN other/JJ variations/NN of/IN Otah/NN in/IN other/JJ countries/NN around/IN us/PRP like/IN Muar/NN Otah/NN and/CC the/DT Thai/JJ Hor/NN Mok/NN ,/, but/CC in/IN Singapore/NNP these/DT are/VBP the/DT two/CD that/WDT are/VBP usually/RB sold/VBN at/IN the/DT hawker/NN centres/NN ./. The/DT big/JJ difference/NN between/IN the/DT two/CD ,/, I/PRP feel/VB ,/, is/VBZ not/RB just/RB in/IN the/DT different/JJ fragrance/NN that/WDT the/DT leaves/VBZ impart/VB ,/, but/CC the/DT fact/NN that/IN the/DT coconut/JJ leaf/NN version/NN is/VBZ dry/JJ and/CC has/VB a/DT layer/NN of/IN ``/JJ skin/NN ''/NN while/IN the/DT banana/JJ leaf/NN version/NN tends/NN to/TO be/VB more/JJR moist/NNS ./. The/DT reason/NN for/IN this/DT is/VBZ the/DT fact/NN that/IN they/PRP grill/VBD the/DT coconut/NN leaf/NN version/NN ,/, the/DT fish/NN paste/NN tends/NN to/TO swell/VB up/NN and/CC causes/VBD a/DT slit/NN to/TO form/VB between/IN the/DT coconut/NN leaves/VBZ ./. So/RB this/DT version/NN tends/NN to/TO be/VB dryer/NN and/CC if/IN grilled/VBN over/IN charcoal/NN ,/, gets/VBZ that/WDT nice/JJ smokey/JJ aroma/NN ./. The/DT banana/NN leaf/NN version/NN on/IN the/DT other/JJ hand/NN is/VBZ more/RB airtight/JJ and/CC the/DT moisture/NN is/VBZ trapped/JJ inside/IN the/DT leaf/NN and/CC so/RB the/DT fish/NN paste/NN steams/NN in/IN its/PRP$ own/JJ juices/NNS ./. The/DT texture/NN tends/NN to/TO be/VB more/RB tender/JJ and/CC moist/JJ but/CC it/PRP does/VBZ lack/IN the/DT smokiness/NN of/IN the/DT coconut/JJ leaf/NN version/NN ./. Both/NNS are/VBP good/JJ in/IN their/PRP$ own/JJ way/NN but/CC I/PRP tend/VBD to/TO gravitate/VB towards/IN the/DT coconut/JJ leaf/NN version/NN because/IN of/IN the/DT smokey/JJ aroma/NN and/CC the/DT fact/NN that/IN it/PRP is/VBZ easier/JJ to/TO eat/VB it/PRP direct/RB from/IN the/DT coconut/NN leaf/NN ./. They/PRP use/VBP very/RB fresh/JJ mackeral/NN here/RB for/IN their/PRP$ Otah/NN and/CC the/DT spices/NNS are/VBP fragrant/JJ without/IN being/VBG overly/RB spicy/JJ which/WDT is/VBZ great/JJ for/IN me/PRP personally/NN ./. Those/RB people/NNS looking/VBG for/IN endorphin/JJ releasing/NN pain/NN from/IN an/DT overdose/NN of/IN capsaicin/NN would/MD undoubtedly/VB be/VB disappointed/VBD that/IN they/PRP ca/MD n't/RB get/VB their/PRP$ high/JJ ./. They/PRP currently/RB grill/VB their/PRP$ Otah/NN over/IN a/DT gas/NN flame/NN ,/, so/RB if/IN you/PRP do/VB buy/VB some/JJ for/IN your/PRP$ BBQ/NN ,/, I/PRP am/VBP sure/JJ it/PRP would/MD taste/VB even/RB better/NN !/. 4.25/DT \//JJ 5/CD Conclusion/NN Specialist/NN Otar/NN stalls/NN at/IN hawker/NN centres/NNS are/VBP unusual/VBN nowadays/RB ./. Most/JJS would/MD source/VB from/IN a/DT supplier/NN like/IN Hiang/NN Soon/NN and/CC just/RB grill/VB it/PRP ./. It/PRP used/VBD to/TO be/VB a/DT favorite/JJ snack/NN at/IN the/DT Wayang/NNP -LRB-/NNP Chinese/NNP Opera/NN -RRB-/NN ,/, but/CC nowadays/RB you/PRP probably/RB find/VB it/PRP more/RB commonly/RB served/VBD as/IN an/DT accompaniment/NN for/IN Nasi/NNP Lemak/NNP ./. Since/IN Muar/NN Otar/NN is/VBZ so/RB popular/JJ ,/, I/PRP wonder/VB why/WRB there/EX are/VBP not/RB more/JJ suppliers/IN making/VBG this/DT version/NN of/IN Otah/NN for/IN sale/NN in/IN Singapore/NNP ?/.
